transcript:

(silence)
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Telugu or Kannada call kar sakte.
Customer: Please sir Hindi nahi aata.
Customer: Nahi sir nahi sir.
Customer: Sir aap se baat hui thi na sir mujhe usi ke against sir baat karni thi aap se.
Customer: Aap aapka discussion hua tha na kal?
Customer: Sir please please Kannada or Telugu please call sir please.
Executive: Sir there is no person is there is any other person who can understand English or Hindi sir from your side? Koi aapke paas ho jo English ya Hindi samajh pae sir?
Customer: Sir actually humko problem ho gaya IndiaMART se problem ho gaya. Hum to not understand to your team okay?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Sir usi ke regarding usi ke against me maine call kiya hai aapko sir. Aapne ek feedback diya na not satisfied. Haan yes sir not satisfied sir that's satisfied sir. 100% satisfied. To kya kya reason raha hai sir aap ek baar mujhe bataiye kya reason raha hai? Abhi to jo buyleads hai available aapke area by area se bhi available hai.
Customer: Okay sir okay humko sir package kitna date check karo sir kitna time kitna month me package diya tum check karo June se hai.
Executive: Abhi to abhi to ha July me aapne liya tha.
Customer: July me hai July me July me diya payment diya complete ho gaya this is a catalog complete karaya okay very successful ho gaya okay.
Executive: Hmm haan ji.
Customer: Package diye ko baad me two three times four times me humko incoming call aa gaya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kya incoming orders aa gaya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay this is a hamara surrounding area humko thousand bag cement diya 100 bag cement diya kuch phone aa gaya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Cement ho gaya 10 days baad me ek nahi ek number ek incoming call nahi aayega humko check karo please.
Executive: Hmm. Ek second me check karu.
Customer: Okay aap aapne jo number aapne jo number please number please number.
Customer: One minute sir one minute sir one minute sir.
(silence)
Customer: Number number.
(silence)
Customer: Five hundred sixty rupees.
Customer: Sir alter attack 200 Rajan proof 160.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir boliye sir boliye sir check karo sir.
Executive: Sir maine check kiya sir isme na aapne na check karo sir kitna cash aayega check karo sir. Call nahi aaya hai uska reason hai.
Customer: Wahi wahi sir wahi wahi.
Executive: Hmm isme na aapne jo select kiya hua hai na sir call foreign countries se call aaye wo cheez location aapne select ki hui hai. To wo aapko change karna hai.
Customer: One minute sir one minute sir one minute sir. Hmm bataiye. Incoming calls wahi wahi not coming sir hamara phone ko. Because because because you have selected the calls from foreign countries only.
Customer: Oh call you have one minute. Yeah you have you have selected the option for. Yeah you have to deselect you you have to disable that option sir you have to disable that option.
Customer: One minute sir app open kar liya check boliye sir.
Executive: App open kar diya setting option me jaaiye setting ka ek option hai aapke paas.
Customer: Setting one minute one minute sir. Haan setting. Abhi three dots me three dots. Haan three dots me setting PNS call setting aa raha hoga PNS call setting.
Customer: PNS haa. Haan sir PNS. PNS call setting. So waha par ek yes ek button hoga aapka.
Executive: One minute one minute PNS call not visible sir.
Customer: Are you on phone or your system sir?
Executive: Sir sir phone sir phone.
Customer: Phone only ek rukiye ga line pe. Sir buyleads lead manager share products my drive my payments buyleads balance. Sir nahi aayega sir kya bole sir ek baar bolo. PNS ka option aa raha hai PNS setting call setting.
Executive: Setting hoga yaar setting setting aaya. Setting me aaya PNS ke call setting aisa aa raha hoga PNS call setting.
Customer: One minute sir one minute setting me PNS. PNS setting aaya. Okay sir okay waha par likha hoga would you like to receive call from foreign countries aapko usko band karna hai wo yes hai na to usko no karna hai.
Executive: Sir hmm. Sir PNS setting okay your number is haa number linked hoga 94 wala aapka 776800 hai wo wala number linked hoga isse upar ek line likhi hogi would you like to receive call from foreign countries to usko disable karna hai aapko.
Customer: Nahi sir please timing number hai how to work add number nahi aata sir. Aap mujhe apna whatsapp number bataiyega whatsapp number bataiye. Same number sir same number hi ko karo sir humko screenshot share karo. Haan ek baar number bolenge number boliye. 944 944 966 966 776 776 944 966 776 haan. Open kijiye whatsapp pe aapko add kiya hai. Hi karo sir hi karo sir. Screenshot share kijiyega.
(silence)
Customer: Screenshot bhejiye ga sir. Okay sir okay.
(silence)
Customer: Sir isko scroll down kijiyega niche jaiega isme. Sir niche niche jaakar screenshot bhejiye ga niche jaakar niche kijiyega. One minute sir humko bhejiye sir one minute sir ek minute.
(silence)
Customer: Milega milega milega milega.
(silence)
Customer: Sir okay sir back ho gaya back ho na. Haan ji. Sir screenshot humko dekh liya. Screen isme abhi phone pe option show nahi kar raha sir agar possible hai to ek laptop pe ek baar open kar lijiye ek minute lagega waha se connect ho jaega. Laptop nahi sir laptop nahi. Laptop system bhi nahi hai. Sir haan this is incoming call phone me aayega laptop me aayega. Nahi ye aapko option disable karna hai bas keval ye jo option hai na disable karne ka ye laptop me aata hai ye aapne foreign countries se call select kiya hua hai to tum karo tum karo. Sir meri side se wo login nahi hai na aapko wo access nahi hai mere paas. This is a fraud sir 100% fraud sir this is. To aap mujhe allow kar de to mai aap mujhe allow kar dijiye to mai aapki side se kar deta hu aap mujhe allow kar dijiye this is fraud. Payment payment kariye to payment complete hua hai to 100% incoming nahi aata fraud sir total. Mai isko on karwa deta hu aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye mai aapko call kar raha hu abhi theek hai aap mujhe 100% fraud. Haan mai mai theek karwata hu aap mujhe aap mujhe time dijiye mai karwata hu theek hai isko theek hai sir mai abhi call kar raha hu aapko. Okay abhi call karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving incoming calls.

- Believes it is a fraud.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for not receiving calls.

- Guided to disable foreign calls option in settings.

- Asked to share screenshot on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after the call.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- incoming calls, pns settings, foreign calls, whatsapp
